topic.title: Behavioral Health Assessment Domain - conformance rules

section.p: Known Subclasses: Education, Employment Status, Service History, Diagnostic Summary, Legal Problem, Physical Health, Medication, Psychiatric Problem, Drug Use History, Family Social History

lines.i: This class is container for a set of questions and answers needed to evaluate behavioral health issues. This class description is consistent with the 'HL7 Implementation Guide for CDA Release 2: CDA Framework for Questionnaire Assessments, Release 1 '.

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] codedQuestion with data type Coded Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a coded response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] trueFalseQuestion with data type Boolean Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a true or false (boolean) response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] numericQuestion with data type Integer Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a numeric (integer) response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] frequencyQuestion with data type Frequency Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a frequency response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] quantityQuestion with data type Quantity Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a quantity response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] outcome, where its type is Outcome
This is a directed association describing the relationship between an assessment and the outcome measurements related to that assessment.

This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a numeric (integer) response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] frequencyQuestion with data type Frequency Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a frequency response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] quantityQuestion with data type Quantity Question
This attribute corresponds to the set of questions that require a quantity response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] outcome, where its type is Outcome
This is a directed association describing the relationship between an assessment and the outcome measurements related to that assessment.
